articles.author: Majda Bouzaroita - Morocco World News
articles.title: Wave Goodbye to Google Podcasts App - Morocco World News
articles.description: Google has decided to shut down their Podcasts application, effective immediately in the  United States.  The tech giant has set a deadline for users to migrate their subscriptions to YouTube Music by April 2, TechCrunch reported.

articles.title: Markets News, April 1, 2024: Tech Spared Stock Pullback; Treasury Yields Jump After PCE - Investopedia
articles.description: Stocks were mostly lower Monday, with tech and energy the exceptions, as Treasury yields climbed following an inflation report Friday that may cloud the Fed's path toward interest rate cuts.

articles.title: Trump’s DJT stock plunges after posting a big loss for 2023 - CNN
articles.description: Truth Social owner Trump Media & Technology Group disclosed Monday that it lost more than $58 million and generated very little revenue in 2023.
